name: NEIPv6Settings
desc: NEIPv6Settings contains the Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6) settings of a IP layer network tunnel.

items.name: var addresses: [String]
items.desc: The IPv6 addresses to assign to the TUN interface.

items.name: var networkPrefixLengths: [NSNumber]
items.desc: The IPv6 network prefix lengths to assign to the TUN interface.

items.name: var includedRoutes: [NEIPv6Route]?
items.desc: The routes that specify what IPv6 network traffic will be routed to the TUN interface.

items.name: var excludedRoutes: [NEIPv6Route]?
items.desc: The routes that specify what IPv6 network traffic will be routed to the primary physical interface.

items.name: class NEIPv6Route
items.desc: NEIPv6Route contains settings for an IPv6 route.
